professional_summary: Experienced software engineer with over a year of experience in crafting, developing, and implementing dependable applications. Proficient in coding, debugging, and overseeing software systems in adherence to industry standards and best practices. Possessing adept problem-solving abilities, committed to delivering superior solutions tailored to meet client specific needs. Strong teamwork and communication skills facilitate seamless collaboration and drive successful project deliveries.

experience.description: Utilized Angular and React to create responsive and interactive user interfaces, implemented scalable backend services with Spring Boot, developed mobile applications for Android and iOS, managed the complete iOS app launch process on the App Store, and implemented Firebase Authentication and Push Notifications.

Developed and maintained cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter, ensured smooth functionality on both Android and iOS platforms, managed the complete iOS app launch process on the App Store, implemented Firebase Authentication and Push Notifications.

projects.name: Deep Learning Approaches for Detecting Common Skin Diseases Using Digital Image Processing
projects.description: Demonstrated expertise in machine learning and image analysis by utilizing deep learning models to automate skin disease detection via digital image processing in a collaborative research endeavor.

projects.name: Learning Management System (LMS) webapplication - ARIMAC Lanka project
projects.description: Utilized a web-based Learning Management System (LMS) to effectively distribute educational content, facilitating the seamless creation, delivery, and management of content by instructors.

projects.name: Cake Selling APP
projects.description: The Android app was created for bakers to organize their products. It is built on native Android technology.

projects.name: Cleaning Service Web Application
projects.description: The purpose of this web application is to streamline cleaning operations and orders for an Australian cleaning services company, enhancing their efficiency.

projects.name: Smart Hotel Room
projects.description: The project focused on a fresh hotel room concept that introduces a new interface to the hotel industry, offering customers a more luxurious and comfortable stay. Simultaneously, owners will profit from room automation.
